titleStmt.title: Commission of Justiciary for securing the peace of the Highlands
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the Heirs and Successors of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the King's most Excellent Majestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Kensingtoun the thirty day of March 1697, and of Our Reign the eight year.
